item.title: Kate add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "And in the end it is not the years in your life that count, it's the life in your years." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Kate add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I don't want to achieve immortality through my work; I want to achieve immortality through not dying. I don't want to live on in the hearts of my countrymen; I want to live on in my apartment." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Kate add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Kate add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "My aim is to put down on paper what I see and what I feel in the best and simplest way." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Kate add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Kate add a quote by Alexis M. Smith
item.description: "It's a strange product of infatuation, she thinks. To want to tell someone about mundane things. The awareness of another person suddenly sharpens your senses, so that the little things come into focus and the world seems more beautiful and complicated." -- Alexis M. Smith

item.title: Kate add a quote by Alexis M. Smith
item.description:
"Dear L-- Fell asleep in a park. Started to rain. Woke up with my hat full of leaves. You are all I see when I open or close a book.
Yours, M" -- Alexis M. Smith
